mapper.select: SELECT G.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY gallery_id DESC) AS SEQ, gallery_id, owner, title, description, read_cnt, reg_date, update_date FROM gallery ) G WHERE SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY gallery_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery ( gallery_id, owner, password, title, description ) VALUES ( GALLERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{owner}, #{password}, #{title}, #{description} )
